name: Very Realistic 2D Golf
description:
This game was made for Devtober 2021 and was made in 24 Days.

Very Realistic 2D Golf explains itself by the name. If you understand sarcasm, you know that the game is TOTALLY unrealistic.

In Very Realistic 2D Golf you control a ball which needs to get to his goal. There are many things in levels, that can ruin or improve your play. You may need to aim properly to finish levels quickly. 

Controls: 

Just hold with left mouse button and let go after you moved your mouse.
